</gmd:citation>          <gmd:abstract>             <gco:CharacterString>The Gridded 5km GHCN-Daily Temperature and  Precipitation Dataset (nClimGrid) consists of four climate variables derived from the GHCN-D dataset: maximum temperature, minimum temperature, average temperature and precipitation. Each file provides monthly values in a 5x5 lat/lon grid for the Continental United States.  Data is available from 1895 to the present. On an annual basis, approximately one year of "final" nClimGrid will be submitted to replace the initially supplied "preliminary" data for the same time period. Users should be sure to ascertain which level of data is required for their research.</gco:CharacterString>          </gmd:abstract>          <gmd:purpose>             <gco:CharacterString>To provide a gridded in situ dataset to the public for easy calculations of regional climate trends or comparisons with other gridded datasets.</gco:CharacterString>          </gmd:purpose>          <gmd:status>
